data: Elizabeth Johnson works as the Chief Operating Officer at NextGen Health, overseeing global operations and strategic partnerships.
Elizabeth Johnson has over 15 years of leadership experience in healthcare technology.
Elizabeth Johnson previously served as Vice President of Operations at MediCore and as Director at HealthSync.
Elizabeth Johnson holds an MBA from the Kellogg School of Management.
Elizabeth Johnson leads operational strategy, vendor management, and cross-border team integration and has scaled operations across Europe and Asia with budgets exceeding $200 million.
Elizabeth Johnson is located in Chicago, Illinois, US.
Elizabeth Johnson was a keynote speaker at Healthcare Summit 2023 and was interviewed on the HealthTech Podcast.
